mapper.select: select FAQ_NO, FAQ_CATEGORY_CD, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_ORDER, STATUS, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT from FAQ where USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FAQ_ORDER ASC, FAQ_NO DESC
select FAQ_NO, FAQ_CATEGORY_CD, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_ORDER, STATUS, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT from FAQ where FAQ_CATEGORY_CD=#{faqCategoryCd} and USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FAQ_ORDER ASC, FAQ_NO DESC
select FAQ_NO, FAQ_CATEGORY_CD, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_ORDER, STATUS, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT from FAQ where FAQ_NO=#{faqNo}

select FAQ_NO, FAQ_CATEGORY_CD, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_ORDER, STATUS, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT from FAQ where USE_YN = 'Y' and( FAQ_TITLE like '%' ||#{keyword}||'%' or FAQ_CONTENT like '%' ||#{keyword}||'%' ) ORDER BY FAQ_ORDER ASC, FAQ_NO DESC
